availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Fogle (Lebanon, Marion Co, attorney)

body.p: Lebanon, Marion County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of John A. Fogle. Married to Mary S. Davis Fogle in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1846. Father of John D. Fogle, Clinton Fogle, Annie G Fogle, William Fogle, Martha Fogle, and Elizabeth P. Fogle. Married to Lizzie N. Lawrence Fogle in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 24, 1865. Attorney in Marion County in 1850. Attorney in Marion County in 1860.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482710, p. 191
